channel.title: personal on Peyton Walters
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Peyton Walters

item.title: Constant Improvement - A Reflection
item.description: From Sunday, 3/10/19 to today, Tuesday 5/21/19, I’ve been working on improving. During that time, I decided on a single, small improvement to make each week, and I tried to execute on it. Each week, I’d outline the motivation behind my decision, the tools I’d be using, and the rules I’d have to follow during the week. The next week, I’d write a short reflection on how I thought the week went with respect to my adherence to the rules I set.

item.title: Thoreau vs. Peterson - A Lesson in Solitude
item.description: Like the water, the Walden ice, seen near at hand, has a green tint, but at a distance is beautifully blue, and you can easily tell it from the white ice of the river, or the merely greenish ice of some ponds, a quarter of a mile off. Sometimes one of those great cakes slips from the ice-man’s sled into the village street, and lies there for a week like a great emerald, an object of interest to all passers.
